org.gbif.crawler.common

Class ZooKeeperConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.crawler.common.ZooKeeperConfiguration

  • public class ZooKeeperConfiguration
extends Object
    A configuration class which can be used to get all the details needed to create a connection to ZooKeeper needed by the Curator Framework.

    It provides a convenience method (getCuratorFramework() ()} to actually get a CuratorFramework object when populated fully.

    • Method Detail

      • getCuratorFramework

        public org.apache.curator.framework.CuratorFramework getCuratorFramework()
                                                                  throws IOException
        This method returns a connection object to ZooKeeper with the provided settings and creates and starts a CuratorFramework. These settings are not validated in this method so only call it when the object has been validated.
        Returns:
        started CuratorFramework
        Throws:
        IOException - if connection fails

        public String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
